descriptionHtml:
Check my youtube.
_______________________
www.youtube.com/TehHomeTheatre





Waterfall  Cavern
_______________________________

*Lore friendly player home
*Fully Navmeshed
*Companion friendly 
*Comes with a friendly bear pet named Drem
(Dovah for peace)
*Beautiful view of Windhelm & Azuras Shrine
*A Dovahkiin get away
_______________________________

        Youtuber\'s

*If you show this in your vids I recommend that it
be between 5 pm and 7pm in game time for the *warm*
sunlight rays passing through the cave. (Beautiful!)
________________________________

        Troubleshooting 

-DLC is NOT required.

-This should not conflict with any mods UNLESS you have 
other mods installed in the exact location.
________________________________

-There are some hidden chests and scattered throughout the cavern


                   THANKS FOR DOWNLOADING MY MOD :)
author: teetywc21
